ygData.subject: Re: ? MOB ?
ygData.msgSnippet: MOB = Mobile OBject. It is an old mud term used to refer to NPCs and monsters. Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server) Servant of Light,
ygData.messageBody:
MOB = Mobile OBject. It is an old mud term used to refer to NPCs and
monsters.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: osmosis [mailto:osmosis@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 1:37 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: ? MOB ?
>
>
> From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>
> I have a simple to answer and possibly naive question... what is an MOB?
> Try as I might, I cannot conclude what this acronym stands for!
>
